title: AI will rewrite the architecture of the newsroom
description: When I testified before a House of Commons committee in the Canadian Parliament recently about AI’s impact on journalism, I described three shifts that are quietly reshaping the news industry. Those three shifts form the basis of my 2026 outlook. Let me contextualize them. The first shift is that people are no longer just reading...
